section.heading: Establishment of State Health Planning and Development Fund.

para.text: There is established as a special fund the State Health Planning and Development Agency Fund ("SHPDA Fund"), which shall be administered by the Mayor in accordance with this section. All fees and civil fines relating to the SHPDA shall be deposited in the SHPDA Fund.
Money received by and deposited in the SHPDA Fund shall be used for the following purposes:
To pay the salaries of employees and other necessary expenses of carrying out the duties of the SHPDA; and

To the extent money is available in the SHPDA Fund in excess of the amount necessary to pay for the costs described in paragraph (1) of this subsection, to pay salaries and other expenses necessary in carrying out other health assessment, planning, and evaluation functions of the Department.

Any money remaining available in the SHPDA Fund at the end of the fiscal year, as determined by the Chief Financial Officer in the fiscal year-end close, shall be transferred to the unassigned fund balance of the General Fund of the District of Columbia as part of the fiscal year-end close.
